text: Can you help me change my appointment?
Sure, I can help with that. What's your appointment ID and the new date and doctor you want to reschedule it to?
My appointment ID is 90123456, and I want to change the date to October 15th and see Dr. Brown instead of Dr. Smith.
Okay, let me modify your registration with that information.
Done. Your appointment has been rescheduled to October 15th with Dr. Brown.
